title: Chicken & Rice Power Bowl
description: Grilled chicken, brown rice, black beans, avocado, and salsa. Meal prep king â€” makes 4 at once.
ingredients: 1 can (15 oz) black beans, drained and rinsed
steps: Cook brown rice according to package directions.
Season chicken with cumin, garlic powder, salt, and pepper.
Grill or pan-sear chicken for 6-7 minutes per side until cooked through (165Â°F internal).
Let chicken rest 5 minutes, then slice into strips.
Divide rice between 4 bowls or containers.
Top each with chicken, black beans, sliced avocado, and salsa.
Squeeze lime over each bowl. Refrigerate meal prep portions for up to 4 days.
